DOC.brief_summary: During 2013-2014 influenza season , CKD patient undergo HD participate study . The patient randomize two group ( MF59-adjuvanted vaccine group non-adjuvanted vaccine group ) immunize respective vaccine . Sera collect prior vaccination 1and 6 month post vaccination . Levels hemagglutination inhibition ( HI ) antibody measure .
